name: Lime Mojito
description: A simple Lime Mojito recipie that can be easily scaled up for multiple people and brings out the best flavour from a simple mojito.
directions: Place mint leaves and 1 lime wedge into a glass.
Crush the mint and lime using a muddler to release the mint oils and lime juice.
Add two more lime wedges and the sugar, and muddle again to release the lime juice. Do not strain the mixture.
Fill the glass almost to the top with ice
Pour the rum over the ice and fill the glass with soda water
Garnish with the remaining lime wedge
